title: CREDIT CARD
description: A credit card is a payment card issued to users (cardholders) to enable the cardholder to pay a merchant for goods and services based on the cardholder's promise to the card issuer to pay them for the amounts plus the other agreed charges. The card issuer (usually a bank) creates a revolving account and grants a line of credit to the cardholder, from which the cardholder can borrow money for payment to a merchant or as a cash advance. (Source: Wikipedia)

active.title: active
active.description: Indicates whether a financial instrument is active or inactive. true=Active, false=Inactive.

paymentAlias.title: paymentAlias
paymentAlias.description:
Name used to identify the payment method.
DEPRECATED: Use name instead.

cardCategory.title: cardCategory
cardCategory.description: Card category of the payment card.

id.title: creditCardId
id.description: Unique Identifier of Credit Card as created by ERP system

cardVerificationValue.title: cardVerificationValue
cardVerificationValue.description:
Card Verification Value (CVV) is a 3- or 4-digit number used to verify that the card is physically there. Thus it's meant to make it less easy to abuse stolen or faked credit card infos.
Other names:
Card Validation Code (CVC), Card Verification Number (CVN), Card Security Code (CSC), Card Code Verification (CCV)

creditCardNumberLastFourDigits.title: creditCardNumberLastFourDigits
creditCardNumberLastFourDigits.description:
The last 4 digits of the number imprinted on a credit card. 
Boehringer does not store a complete credit card number of any business partner, but a credit card token instead.

cardNumber.title: cardNumber
cardNumber.description:
The Credit Card Number.
For Credit Cards either Credit Card Number with additional information needs to be maintained or the Credit Card Token shared with the Token Processing Organization.

creditCardToken.title: creditCardToken
creditCardToken.description:
A credit card token is a key / code for an actual credit card number. The translation / mapping of this code to the actual credit card number is known only to the credit card issuing organization or its trusted transaction processing organization. 
Usually Boehringer only holds a credit card token for any credit card, instead of the actual credit card number (for data security reasons).

expirationDate.title: expirationDate
expirationDate.description:
Date on which the payment card becomes invalid.
This means the last month the credit card is valid to be used.

nameOfCardholder.title: nameOfCardholder
nameOfCardholder.description: The (first and last) name of the person or company embossed on the payment card.

reasonForPaymentCardLock.title: reasonForPaymentCardLock
reasonForPaymentCardLock.description:
Indicates whether a payment card is blocked and for what reason.
This block only applies to one particular payment card. If the client has several payment cards, another card can still be used.
[Source: SAP field help]

standardPaymentCard.title: standardPaymentCard
standardPaymentCard.description:
Indicates that this is the standard payment card of a business partner, should there be more than one set of payment card details.
[Source: SAP field help]

validFromDate.title: validFromDate
validFromDate.description: Start of validity of the payment card.
